**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the Dallas City Council will convene on August 26, 2024, at 11:30 AM. The meeting will be held both in-person at City Hall and via video conference, allowing public attendance. The primary purpose of the meeting is to discuss administrative matters, specifically the finalization of the Dallas City Manager brochure.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting on August 19, 2024.
2. Discussion on the finalization of the Dallas City Manager brochure prepared by Baker Tilly.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a review of the brochure intended for the City Manager position, which is crucial for attracting suitable candidates. This document is expected to outline the responsibilities and expectations of the role, as well as highlight the cityâ€™s values and goals.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will aim to finalize the brochure for the City Manager position. There may also be discussions held in executive session regarding legal matters or personnel evaluations, as permitted under Texas law. 

Overall, this meeting is significant for shaping the leadership structure within the Dallas City Council and ensuring effective recruitment for the City Manager role.
